template.name: Level-1EmailTemplate
template.subject: EscalationlevelL1-IncidentId: %Workflow.InIncidentId% -ATMID: SITEID=%Workflow.InTermId%: %Workflow.InSiteId%-%Workflow.InCategory%.%Workflow.InSubCategory%.%Workflow.InSubSubCategory%
template.body:
Due to non-resolution of the IncidentId: %Workflow.InIncidentId%-%Workflow.InCategory%.%Workflow.InSubCategory%.%Workflow.InSubSubCategory%fortheATMID: SITEID=%Workflow.InTermId%: %Workflow.InSiteId%, It has been escalated to LevelL1.
Please resolve the incident in order to avoid further escalation

This is an auto-generated email. Please do not reply or write back to this Email ID.
